original_text: Now two men remained in the camp, one named Eldad, and the other named Medad, and the Spirit rested on them. They were among those registered, but they had not gone out to the tent, and so they prophesied in the camp.
korean_text: 그 기명된 자 중 엘닷이라 하는 자와 메닷이라 하는 자 두 사람이 진영에 머물고 장막에 나아가지 아니하였으나 그들에게도 영이 임하였으므로 진영에서 예언한지라

sentences.original_text: Now two men remained in the camp
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 두 사람이 진영에 남아 있었는데

sentences.original_text: and the Spirit rested on them
but they had not gone out to the tent
and so they prophesied in the camp
